content.prompt: The passage by al-Khatib best illustrates which of the following?

choices.label: The literary tradition of long-distance travelers in the Islamic world
The growth of scientific thought and innovation in Muslim Spain
The impact of Christian attempts to reconquer Spain from the Muslims
The efforts of Islamic missionaries to spread their faith along trade routes

topic.text: 1.2: Developments in Dar al-Islam from c. 1200 to c. 1450

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
